IMP VOTING  Voting for mcountdown is open.  Its free and easy. You just need a Google/ insta / twitter etc  Step 1 Go to mwave.me Sign in using Google / insta etc  Step 2  Click on mcountdown -> prevoting  Step 3 In the prevoting page select shootout. Then scroll down and click on vote.  Step 4  Complete captcha and click on submit. You'll get a message "thank u for voting". P.S sometimes if you sign up via Google they'll ask u ur dob, region and email once again. It doesn't take more than a minute.  If you can't find the site just Google mwave prevoting. 💜💜💜💜 If you've got any doubts feel free to ask. ☺️

To new fans, welcome! Our fandom is called Monbebe.   Monsta X consists of seven members. They are : Shownu, Wonho, Minhyuk, Kihyun, Hyungwon, Jooheon, I.M.   Monsta X was formed from a survival show called No Mercy. They debuted on 14th May 2015, under Starship Entertainment.   0:05  1:01  1:20  3:07   Shownu - He is the leader of the group. His name is Sohn Hyunwoo. His position in the group is main dancer, along with being lead vocal. He is the oldest member. He is called Papa Bear by his fans. You can distinguish him by his tall, muscled appearance.   0:49  2:01  2:38  3:00   Wonho - He likes exercising. His name is Lee Hoseok. His position in the group is lead vocal, along with being lead dancer. He likes to eat, and absolutely loves ramen. He always calls himself handsome, wherever he goes. You can distinguish him by his muscled appearance, along with his squared chin.   0:55  2:06  2:15  2:52   Minhyuk - He is the mood-maker of the group. His name is Lee Minhyuk. His position in the group is vocalist, along with being a visual. He is known as the person who takes the most selfies. He is known to be the loudest member. You can distinguish him by his thin face.   1:13  2:24  3:11  3:19   Kihyun - He is known as the mother of the group. His name is Yoo Kihyun. His position in the group is main vocal. He is referred to as hamster by his fans. He nags a lot at his members. You can distinguish him by his short appearance.   1:08  1:39  2:18  2:50   Hyungwon - He is known to have thick lips. His name is Chae Hyungwon. His position in the group is lead dancer, along with being vocalist and visual. He is known to be the member who sleeps a lot. He was formerly a model. You can distinguish him by his tall appearance, and his thick lips.   0:03  0:26  1:55  2:34   Jooheon - He is famous for his fast and intense rap. His name is Lee Jooheon. His position in the group is main rapper. He is an aegyo(display of affection) king. He is the member who easily gets scared. You can distinguish him by his broad face.   0:38  1:49  2:13  2:22   I.M - He is the youngest member in the group. His name is Im Changkyun. His position in the group is lead rapper. He is famous for his deep voice, contrary to his face. He loves memes, and is trendy. You can distinguish him by his small face.   You can watch their interviews to distinguish them. I suggest Weekly Idol. You can watch No Mercy to get to know them better as well.

Alright, I have a theory about who is which deadly sin. I took some time to do my research on the sins and I watched the MV about ten times until I came to a conclusion. Here it goes:  Pride - obsesseion with a false and twisted image of oneself, fake greatness. This is Hyungwon. He is sitting on a throne, looking all pretty. He believes he is higher than everyone else. Greed - longing for material gain, people who suffer from greed are usually manipulators, thiefs and are mostly violent. This is Jooheon. He appears to be very violent and greedy to come out of that cage. He has handcuffs on his hand and that thing over his mouth which indicates that someone stopped him from taking too much. Lust - an intense want for an object or action (sex, power, money...). This is Wonho. He is in a cage meaning he cannot get what he wants and the smoke indicates he is very intense about it. Also him standing in an empty theater means he is lusting for power that he will never really get. Envy - wanting something that one does not have whether it be in the form of achivement or material possesion. This is I.M because we see him burn that card and also he is peeping through the blinds, watching something. Gluttony - over-consumption of food, drink or wealth. This is Minhyuk. He can't stop touching the thorns and eventually they hurt him and make him bleed just like food makes people fat for example. Wrath - intense expression of emotion with hostile responses to provocations. This is Shownu. We can see him holding the wrath card with the match and he was lightning that match previously. Sloth - this is hard to define. Usually it is the feeling of indifference towards the world and avoiding obligations. This is Kihyun because we see him in a room full of manequins and that means he is indifferent towards people. And also he is standing at the bottom of the stairs meaning he is lazy to climb them.  Also we see groupations: Hyungwon with I.M (Pride with envy). Prideful people are usually very fragile and they are secretly envious of others. Jooheon, Wonho and Shownu (Greed, lust and wrath) Lust and greed bring anger. Minhyuk and Kihyun (Sloth and gluttony). If we are obsessed over something we will probably start being lazy over other stuff.  Also we see how some of them reedem themselves. Kihyun walking up the stairs, I.M burning the envy card, Hyungwon lowering his head in shame while sitting on the couch, Shownu becoming aware of his anger, Wonho dancing in the empty theatre focused on himself... I'm just not sure about Jooheon and Minhyuk.
Couldn't be more prouder than this.

I.M death card holder Jooheon key holder of life Kihyun controls the memories of the past and the future Hyungwon / Minhyuk is a detective but is trapped in himself Shownu strategy manager  Wonho victim trapped in death

Now, I understand that this is a Monsta X video, but if you're going to say don't talk about BTS and then put BTS into your own comments, I have like no idea what you want? Like can't you just comment something about the MV instead of complaining about a different group? In addition, with the top comments where there are people arguing about the eap line, everyone is pointing out BTS and ARMY, when no one else is talking about other comments stating other groups,are also better. You just single out BTS and ARMY. Don't attack me, I'm just trying to point out what I've seen. The complaints of plagarism accusations of BTS is something I haven't heard of - yet you claim that RM amd ARMY should apologize for what - releasing a MV on the same day? Never knew it was a crime. Just enjoy the MV, instead of singling out a group and trying to mow them down. Hopefully most Monsta X fans are mature enough to stay unbothered and focus on streaming. Also, please don't reply because I don't want to engage in a fan war, I am simply just stating what I have seen.

Vengo a contar mi experiencia de como llegué hasta aquí.  Bueno, como todos conocen la plataforma de Instagram siempre que quieres buscar algo te salen vídeos o publicaciones de lo que te interese, no soy parte del fandom de Monsta X, pero cuando ví que mi Instagram la gran parte de interés estaban ellos me quedé impresionada, miraba los cortos de un VLive y no me pude resistir a verlo completo en la aplicación. Son unos chicos fantásticos y tienen demasiado talento, vaya ahora me gustaría haber estado desde antes para apoyarlos, porque a partir de ahora lo haré.  He de imaginar que no soy la única, pues me atraparon con sus voces y actitud, el amor que le tiene a sus fans es digno de admirar y me gustaría ser parte de esto.  Espero ser recibida en su fandom como nueva fan dispuesta a apoyar a todo el grupo.   Sin duda estoy maravillada.  ▨12:42.am.▨

I see people saying it's like fake love but??? Im an army but i don't see the resemblance at all. Tbh my first thoughts were 'wow this is so cool' and 'is it an apocalypse concept?' and not 'this sounds/ looks like fake love'. It doesnt? Idk, maybe im just really dumb about picking up pitches and all that. But at least as a piano and dance student, i can tell you that the structure of the songs are quite different, and when compared, shoot out and fake love have different feels, you know? Different textures. Fake Love gives you a sense of loss and betrayal, and while Shoot Out does portray a certain amount of loss, its not nearly as much as Fake Love. Rather, Shoot Out gives you the notion of fighting back, of struggle. So um yeah, i dont think theyre alike at all, but everyone is entitled to their own opinion.

If people are new to MX and interested in their other music, their main MVs in order are as follows: Trespass, Rush, Hero, All In, Stuck, Fighter, Beautiful, Shine Forever, (Newton - not promoted, kind of a special promo for lipton tea lol), Dramarama, Jealousy, then Shoot Out.  MVs we know are connected: - The Clan trilogy: All In, Fighter, Beautiful - The Code/The Connect series?: Dramarama, (Destroyer music film), Jealousy?  They also have a lot of special clip MVs and goofy self-cam MVs you can check out. Enjoy!

And now, for my Thesis/Dissertation on MonstaX's comeback:  1. The song fits their vocal ranges really well. It's not like random whispering for Hyungwon or a weird falsetto for Minhyuk. The two of them especially finally REALLY fit their parts.  2. I feel like Wonho really popped with his vocals for the first time since stuck. Like in Jealousy he really strained but I think this song will really work for him. I can feel it!  3. Shownu and freaking KIHYUN dancing that chorus was so good. Like obviously Shownu is really good but Kihyun fucking OWNED that dance even tho he wasn't center for long 4. SHOWNU FINALLY HAS GOOD HAIR. It's been kinda weird since like All In Era. His looks are poppin and just all the members have been styled super well. Also, Wonho's blond is SUCH a win. I'm psyched for the photobook of the album kjashlkjhfd. 5. Finally, the moment you've all been waiting for.  R A P L I N E. They snapped even harder than like Dramarama and Jealousy? Like how? Tbh I usually like Jooheon's raps more than I.M's but this time I think it's the other way. Like Jooheon was INSANE but I.M broke this whole new level of style? Like Jooheon was always super distinct with his style and I think I.M finally locked into it. It's one of my favorite raps of his. IT'S FUCKING ON F I R E 6. Last but certainly not least. MY BIAS. HYUNGWON. Omg his mini dance-break K I L L E D me and just everything about his aesthetic is too beautiful to handle (haha get it?). ANYWAYS. I loved his parts so much and just him and ugh I'm in love so send help  CONCLUSION: STAN MONSTAX YA HOES

To new Monsta X fans: Our fandom name is Monbebe (it means "my baby" in French) ❤️  From oldest to youngest:  -  Shownu 0:04, 1:01, & 1:20 - Son Hyunwoo (June 18th, 1992) – Leader, main dancer, lead vocal, adorably awkward, appa/dad of the group, almost debuted with Got7, sexy bear 🐻 oh & did I say sexy 😉😆  -  Wonho 0:20, 1:33 & 2:44 - Shin Hoseok/ Lee Hoseok (March 1st, 1993) - Lead vocal, lead dancer, visual, abs master, handsome and knows it, buff bunny. 🐰  -  Minhyuk 0:54, 2:06 & 2:52  - Lee Minhyuk (November 3rd, 1993) - Vocal, Face of Monsta X, visual, sunshine child, loves skinship, loud, Minmoongie, happy virus, hyper pup. 🐶  -  Kihyun 1:12, 2:24 & 3:20 - Yoo Kihyun (November 22nd, 1993) - Main vocal, oemma/mom of the group, powerful voice (Kihyun singing Hyeya is a must see), self-declared visual, savage hamster. 🐹  -  Hyungwon 1:07, 1:39 & 2:50 - Chae Hyungwon (January 15th, 1994) -  Main visual, vocal, lead dancer (has a couple self-choreographed videos), DJ, meme king, professional model, Chaebugi, sleepy turtle. 🐢  -  Jooheon 0:03, 0:26 & 1:55 - Lee Jooheon (October, 6 1994) - Main rapper (he's a beast), vocal, aegyo master, scary cat, Joohoney, thicc thighs, cute dimple boy, loves his daddy (Shownu), honey bee. 🐝  -  I.M 0:37, 1:48 & 2:14 - Changkyun (January 26th, 1996) - Lead rapper, maknae, vocal, Kookoongie, husky voice, loves playing with butts (literally, look it up 😆), speaks English, his mixtape is bomb, swag wolf. 🐺  Debut stage: May 14th, 2015  Comeback: Trespass (Debut), Rush, Hero, Stuck, All in, Fighter, Beautiful, Shine Forever,  Dramarama, & Jealousy.  Variety shows: No Mercy (a survival show where the members had to compete to make it into the group - it's where it all started), Deokspatch, Monsta X Right Now, Deokspatch X, Monsta X ray, Monsta X ray 2,  Monsta X ray 3, Weekly idol, etc.  1st win: November 14th, 2017 🎉 🎊 🍾❤️ 2nd win: April 17, 2018 🎉 🎊 🍾❤️   Get ready! This need a serious analysis, you need to heard the song with out seeing the video to make a real appreciation of the song because ones you see those guys you are totaly lost.  1) I love the rock vibes of the song, the raps parts are the killing point for me. I'm a little sad that the voice of Kihyun isn't more out there, he has one of the best voice in k-pop and I think he can rock like a '70 Robert Plant kinda style. 2) Loving the dark/bad boy/hiper macho concept ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ after of listening this song I feel the need of kneel before them and beg for forgiveness and scream at the top of my lungs: *Shoot Me* 3) The choreography it's hard porn XD not only for monbebes, if you like beautiful, hot, sexy, rough guys, you are going to lose you mind seeing this video. I need the dance practice NOW! I need to see this on live performance NOW! 4) The outfit deserv a standing applause! Oh dear stylists you deserv some kind of prize for make monbebes wildest dreams come true ♥  I stand all 7 members of Monsta X, for me, they all deserv appreciation and have talent, by sides they all look *insane hot* on this video XD  So, after my objective analysis the conclusion is: *HURRA MONSTA X, YOU GUYS STILL HAVE A LOT TO SHOW AND WE ALL DIE TO SEE WHAT'S IT'S NEXT*

Видит бог, уже долгое время я слушаю, восхищаюсь и поддерживаю MONSTA X, столько прекрасных песен было создано за последние года, взять хотя бы All in и Shine forever , но, к сожалению, я стала замечать, что не только произведения этой прекрасной группы, но и произведения почти всех ведущих k-pop групп, стали абсолютно однотипными и не цепляют, хотя стоит признать последний альбом NCT 127 был хорош. Пора бы компаниям задуматься о том, как они собираются развивать k-pop сферу, ибо если все так и будет продолжаться, то все это музыкальное направление канет в бытие, поэтому если вы это читаете(директора, композиторы и все те, кто учавствует в создании всей этой структуры),задумайтесь и сделайте действительно хорошо,ведь и я и все мы понимаем, что все айдолы достаточно талантливые, чтобы творить по-настоящему потрясающую музыку.

WOOOWWW!!! 💖💖💖 this is actually my first comeback as Monbebe and everything about this music video is FREAKING AWESOME!!!  where are all the smart Monbebes?? i wanna read your theories about this mv because i've come up with some!!! i think each of the member represent each of the 7 deadly sins.   my theory: Wonho - sloth (at first i was so sure he represent lust, because you're lying if you said he staring at you at 2:03 doesn't make you feel anything. but, i realized the jail he was in was so small that he stays at one place doing nothing)  Hyungwon - pride (the way he sits on the white throne screams pride to me)  I.M - envy (he burns the envy card & looked at someone/something through a blind. also, i think he has a significant role since he was the one picking out the tarot cards. but, i'm not really sure what it is)  Jooheon - gluttony (the face mask seems like a way to restrict him?)  Shownu - wrath (he light a match creating fire which is an obvious symbol of anger. the matchbox itself has wrath written on it)  Minhyuk - lust (he was the only one who did something to his physical body. he pricked his fingers on the thorns as we can see blood on it)  Kihyun - greed (i'm gonna be honest and say i'm not sure about how he represent greed. there's alot of white mannequins and i'm sure it has got something to do with greed. but, i can't wrap my mind around it)  i obviously missed a lot of other hints/small details from the mv. so, if you agree/disagree/wanna add to my theory, pls do comment because i would LOVE to read other theories 💙💙💙

I really love the key point! Maybe it's supposed to illustrate the backlash of a gun while being fired? - the cinematography is amazing! It looks so pretty and aesthetically pleasing!! It still amazes me how they can film all these dark scenes without the camera failing.. the way the fire is portrayed is also her well done. - don't even get me started on the outfits!!!! They look absolutely gorgeous! The makeup and hairstylist is really good too! They're going for a very dark, but also mysterious concept, which world tremendously well with the not too masculine outfits! - all in all: absolutely amazing and I can't wait for the live performances of this and the full choreo!
